text: 33:55 Josua 23:13; Gumazir Dapaniba 2:3; Onger Akaba 106:34-36; Esekiel 28:24Ia nguazir kamɨn itir gumazamiziba bar me batueghan koghtɨ, me osɨmtɨziba ko mɨzaziba ia danɨngɨva, mati benir ataribar mɨn ian damazibar mɨtiv, egh mati dɨkoniba ian ivibar mɨtivam. Egh me nguazir ia itimɨn aven ia ko mɨdorozibar amuam.
